page.title: 15CHURCH LIFE IN MORETON
page.content: {St. David's}has about 70-80 people at Holy Communion on a normal Sunday. It is the largest of the churches. There are many stained glass windows,a large organ ,a stone pulpit and a font, and it is the only church to have an altar rail. The{Congregational Church}has 60-80 at Morning service and about 15 children at Junior Church. They are sponsoring a girl from Guatemala. There is a memorial window to the Horne family and Thomas Mann. There are no figures of Jesus on the crosses because they believe he has risen. In the{Catholic Church}there are many statues of the stages of Jesus's life. They have many candles and bronze crosses with the crucified Jesus on.50 - 60 people attend Mass.{The Gospel {Hall}is just a plain wooden building with a wooden table and chairs. A plaque says "Jesus Christ is Lord."
